entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 02:49 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain late this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
